title: Ray â€” Fire Engine
overview: A bright fantasy animated series for the whole family about a team of rescue vehicles ready to help everyone who is in trouble. Ray the fire engine is already an experienced fighter despite his young age. Together with a loyal team, he takes care of the kids to protect them. If disaster strikes, Ray and his reliable comrades - Emby, Red, Beacon, Pump, Hazel and Helix - are always ready to go to the rescue at the first call. Three space villains invade the quiet and peaceful life of the town. To arrange riots and troubles for civilians is their strong point. Having found out about this, Ray, together with the team, challenges the villains. If Ray took over, be sure that everyone who stands on the dark side will have a hard time.
